resources.string: Don\'t have an Account? SIGN UP
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Password must be at least 6 characters long
Please Fill in the Details Below to Create an Account
Please Login to Continue Using the App

If you have any questions feel free to ask us by email.
 
 Gerard: gerard.slowey2@mail.dcu.ie
 Michael: michael.savage7@mail.dcu.ie

1. Click the SEARCH FOR A TASTE button to begin your search.
 
 2. Enter your location. Google auto suggest will help you pick your location as you type.
 
 3. Choose your mode of transport. You can choose between Walking, Driving, or Cycling.
 
 4. Repeat the steps for your friend. Enter their location and their mode of transport.
 
 5. Add the type of place you want to meet. You can pick between Bars, Cafes, or Restaurants.
 
 6. click SEARCH to see your map.
 
 
 Your map will show your location and your friend's location as RED markers. You can click on them to see which one is which.
 
 Our algorithm will pick the best spot to start searching from. By default this spot is hidden. It is a BLUE marker and you can toggle it ON/OFF in the settings.
 
 There is also a setting to draw black lines that enclose each RED marker. These lines represent how far a person can reach depending on the mode of transport.

The isochrone is made up of coordinates that join together to form a perimeter around the locations.They represent how far a person can reach within a certain amount of time (15 minutes). Turn it ON/OFF depending on your preference.

\'Your location\' and \'Their location\' are shown as red markers. The best midpoint is shown as a blue marker. If you do not want to see the best meeting place marker, you can turn it ON/OFF depending on your preference.
